label: Graduate Level Harp
description: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in music, or successful completion of a qualifying audition for the string faculty.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in music, or successful completion of a qualifying audition for the string faculty.
classScheduleInformation: Non-music majors will be assessed a fee.
sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Music department.
